solution_line_template: The cost will for {num_adults} adults will be ${adult_ticket_price}/adult x {num_adults} adults = $<<{adult_ticket_price}*{num_adults}={cost_adults}>>{cost_adults}
The cost for {num_children} children will be ${child_ticket_price}/child x {num_children} children = $<<{child_ticket_price}*{num_children}={cost_children}>>{cost_children}
